page.title: 06HOLIDAYS
page.content: For the majority of Atherton's inhabitants the income restricts the choice of holiday.Only people with a higher,steadier income can afford to take holidays abroad. Weather permitting,day outings and weekend breaks are popular all year round.The main holidays are taken during the summer months. People travel from urban to rural areas and seaside resorts such as {BLACKPOOL,MORECAMBE}and{SOUTHPORT}. Areas of natural beauty such as {NATIONAL PARKS}an example of which is the {LAKE DISTRICT},are very popular with the general public. For people travelling abroad, countries in Europe are the most appealing such as France,Spain and Germany.One of the advantages of travelling abroad is the more desirable weather.
